title: Chapter 9
content: Getting Started IF YOU DO NOT HAVE A STRONG REASON, THERE IS NO SENSE READING FURTHER. IT WILL SOUND LIKE TOO MUCH WORK. Someone who pays everyone else first- Often there is nothing left
